DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine clinical activity rosiglitazone patient liposarcoma . - Assess impact regimen marker tumor proliferation differentiation status patient use biologic biochemical test correlative imaging . - Determine tolerance safety regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients stratify histologic subtype ( well differentiate v dedifferentiate v myxoid/round cell v pleomorphic ) . Patients receive oral rosiglitazone twice daily . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 1-3 week every 3 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 56-120 patient ( 14-30 per stratum ) accrue study within 15 month .
